### Who am I?

My name is [Jo Kroese](https://jokroese.com). I'm a data scientist based between Barcelona and Amsterdam.

### What is this?

I realised studying maths had a big impact on the way I think about things. This blog looks at some of the models I take from maths to apply to life.
